#define CPPUNIT_IGNORE(condition)
 

Macro Definition Documentation

#define CPPUNIT_IGNORE (   condition)
Value:
if (condition) \
{ \
CPPUNIT_NS::Message("test ignored", "Expression: " #condition); \
return; \
}
